scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Virgin Mary holding the Christ Child, who is reaching out. To the left, a figure in an orange tunic and blue robe, possibly a donor or a saint, is shown with a book open before them, gesturing towards the Virgin and Child. The background features a decorative pattern of gold foliage on a red ground, framed by architectural elements suggesting an interior space. The overall composition is rich with gold leaf, typical of illuminated manuscripts.
scene_interpretation: Madonna and Child with a Donor/Saint
